#summary Character creation progress

= Character creation =

Character creation happens at the gate when you state your ID card for the guard. The following fields are possible to fill / select:

  * Name
  * Gender
  * Photo
  * Department
    * Guard
    * Scientist
    * Doctor
    * Engineer
    * Government
  * other?

Character attributes:

  * HP
  * Lvl
  * Strength
  * Intelligence
  * Dexterity
  * Charisma
  * Creativity(ability to use multiple special powers as combos)
  * Amount of symbionts
  * Special powers
  * Energy (how much / long the player can use special powers)
